javascript.title:
With React Native & ReactJS (a JavaScript library) you can build mobile apps for both iOS and Android
Below is the roadmap to take in learning React Native

options.title: Learn CSS
options.more_info: CSS is a stylesheet for styling web pages. With a basic knowledge of CSS you can style applications using React Native

options.title: Learn JavaScript
options.more_info: Everything in React Native will involve JavaScript. So it is expedient you learn and know enough JavaScript before moving to React Native

options.title: Learn ReactJS
options.more_info: ReactJS is a JavaScript library for building web apps. React Native uses ReactJS to build mobile apps. Learn React, understand the concepts, practice with it; and get set for the next

options.title: Learn React Native
options.more_info: Getting started with React Native after going through this order would be a lot easier and faster. You'd barely need a day

how-to-learn.title: This is how I used the React resources to learn React, with an article explaining everything

options.title: Code along a tutorial
options.more_info: Step 1 is to code along with a tutorial/crash course that will introduced you to React by creating a React project

options.title: Study the docs
options.more_info: Step 2 is to study the react docs, try out as many examples on the documentation. If you don't fully grasp the docs, try out step 3

options.title: Take a React course (optional)
options.more_info: This step solidifies your understanding of React, I recommend taking this step if the react docs is not clear enough

options.title: Create more projects
options.more_info: Now is the time to create more projects. Try creating 4 to 5 different React projects

options.title: Bonus: Learn in public
options.more_info: Learning in public is like marketing yourself to a dev community. As such you may find companies interested in hiring you

options.title: All of these in an article
options.more_info: This article provides useful information on learning React
